customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Abyss Lector's Smoldering

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Even the bravest of my stray friends dare not approach that imposing, mysterious stranger. It's like the very air around them might combust at any moment..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: After "Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames" triggers "Fiery Rebirth," they will gain the "Shield of Surging Flame."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Abyss Lector's Deflagration

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Though our mysterious guest seems to have an air of self-refinement about them, they will occasionally get mad. In those moments, they will spew flames everywhere, flames that are capable of even setting houses far, far away ablaze..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: After "Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames" triggers "Fiery Rebirth," they will gain the "Shield of Surging Flame."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Fiery Rebirth</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Fiery Rebirth</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character <color=#ffffff>will not be defeated</color> , and heal them to 4 HP. After this effect is triggered, this character deals +1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Immunity to Defeat</color>
Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#ffffff>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#ffffff>defeat</color> . (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: Embers Rekindled
value.desc:
Abyss Lector: Embers Rekindled

The path toward sowing grace is not assured to be one free of obstructions.

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames

value.name: Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames
value.desc:
Wielders of abyssal fire who pursue the meaning behind texts and scriptures. Is a member of the Abyss Order.
The surface people have a slightly distorted understanding of what their name means, calling them "Lectors," when their name can also mean "exegete." Reading the word of grace grants them great power.
